channel.title: Site Management on Homepage
channel.description: Recent content in Site Management on Homepage

item.title: New site
item.description: <p><a href="http://www.clayyount.com">Clayyount.com</a> is live! I’ll be using this blog to post some of my illustration processes, as well as info I think might help people out with illustration, web development or whatever, I’ll also keep you up to date on any new projects I might be working on. For the time being, I am taking <a href="http://localhost:1313/commissions">commission requests</a>, so get them now if you are interested. Bookmark here if you want to get the <a href="http://feeds.feedburner.com/Blog-ClayYount">rss feed</a>.</p>
item.content:encoded: <p><a href="http://www.clayyount.com">Clayyount.com</a> is live! I’ll be using this blog to post some of my illustration processes, as well as info I think might help people out with illustration, web development or whatever, I’ll also keep you up to date on any new projects I might be working on. For the time being, I am taking <a href="http://localhost:1313/commissions">commission requests</a>, so get them now if you are interested. Bookmark here if you want to get the <a href="http://feeds.feedburner.com/Blog-ClayYount">rss feed</a>.</p>
